team.author: Shadi
team.title: brilliant design strategies & markting
team.cardText: A marketing strategy refers to a business's overall game plan for reaching prospective consumers and turning them into customers of the products or services the business provides. A marketing strategy contains the company’s value proposition, key brand messaging, data on target customer demographics, and other high-level elements.

team.author: Nserallah
team.title: learn to manage your time better
team.cardText: How well do you manage your time? If you are like many of us, your answer may be “Not too well.” You may often feel like there is not enough time in a day. Perhaps you even find you constantly have to work late hours to hit your deadlines. Maybe you even feel too busy that you miss meals and sleep. These are all classic signs that you may not be managing your time effectively. Benjamin Franklin once said that time is money. Just like money, time must be managed properly. If you manage time properly you find the right balance between your work

team.author: Abu kamal
team.title: consulting with our specialists
team.cardText: As independent information professionals (IIPs), we work alongside our clients to provide top-notch training and consultative services. We help them better understand and implement information strategies to competitively grow their businesses. We offer custom training and coaching to help clients change and grow for tomorrow's challenges.  Whether focusing on how to implement an information governance program, assess the competitive market, or learn to avoid internet fraud, our members help clients better navigate the complexities of business.
team.famuosSaying: Every day, businesses encourage their employees to be more efficient and productive. There are dozens of ways to make this happen, from implementing innovative technology to bringing in productivity experts.
